attributes.action: Reform adult social care in Wales.
attributes.additional_details: Because like me there are loads of people who have been discharged from hospital with no after care, and like me I was promised so much and yet they left me on a scrap heap with nothing. No physio, no access to the community, no social life and being told I am not entitled to more direct payment hours to employ another PA, this is something the government brought in for disabled people to choose their own care.
attributes.background: Because RCT is failing the adult population of Wales because of no money so we are told.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Welsh Government and Welsh Parliament is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Welsh Parliament has its own Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Parliament, you can find out more here: https://petitions.senedd.wales/
